title: Things I'll never understand about high plat
body:
Why is Viktor rushing Morellos into Talon?

Why is Lucian solo pushing when there's a 6/1Talon?

Why is Lucian still doing this with a score of 3/6/3 and Talon is now 12/1 specifically from him alone.

How does my bot lane go 0/9 in 10 minutes against a mf janna bot lane while they scream for help despite being in front of the enemy turret?

Why is Riven picking Riven into Renekton and going 1/4 with 15 cs in 20 minutes?

How are my Dianas losing to and being outcsd and out roamed and out turreted by fucking Twisted Fate with two doran rings?

Why are Caitlyns that haven't played in 3 months up and deciding trying to play ranked andoverall doing nothing but running around in circles dying at their own turret because they forgot what champs do what. 

Why do Nidalees steal my jungle and try to turret dive Lucian's and die, and then do the same to Oriannas. Go 0/3 in 6 minutes and then go afk

Why does my team never ban brand and let Brand through and proceed to feed to the very brand they called a "bad champion"

Why is Brand's avg kd in mid lane 13/2? 

Why are adcs still getting inf {+ blood thirster for first items? 

Why do people pick Garen into Shen and then suck absolute dick?1

What the fuck is with rammus being spammed along with Vi in high plat? 

Why do I always get the feeding Yasuo on my team? Why do people even play that stupid champion?

How does he always get massively fed when on the enemy team? 

Why is my team always high off their ass/boosted/bought account/duod to victory/ playing shit they're terrible at. 

What is it with high plat and playing Call of Fucking Duty in mid lane and dying late in the game for a turret and giving baron + game despite being spammed back ping 80 times? 

what's so hard about just getting baby baron and dragon and getting turrets? Why do you have to chase alistar into turret and give him triple kills?

Why is it when I play in plat 2-diamond promos I feel like I'm back in Bronze 1 due to how horribly inconsistent and mentally retarded most of the playeer base is. 

Do I just not dodge enough? 

Am I doing something wrong.

I don't know.
